meanings.definition: The quality of being reliable or trustworthy.
meanings.sent1: Her dependableness in completing tasks on time earned her a promotion.
meanings.sent2: I appreciate your dependableness in always showing up for our meetings.
meanings.sent3: His dependableness in bringing snacks to work made him the office favorite.
meanings.sent4: The dependableness of the old lighthouse guided ships safely to shore.
meanings.sent5: The dependableness of the family dog to greet us at the door warms my heart.

meanings.definition: The state of being able to be counted on or relied upon.
meanings.sent1: The team's success was due to the dependableness of each member.
meanings.sent2: In times of crisis, the dependableness of our emergency services is crucial.
meanings.sent3: The dependableness of the weather forecast was surprisingly accurate.
meanings.sent4: His dependableness in keeping secrets made him a trusted confidant.
meanings.sent5: The dependableness of the bus schedule saved me from being late to work.
